original_text:
as far as the east is from the west,
    so far has he removed our transgressions from us.
korean_text: 동이 서에서 먼 것 같이 우리의 죄과를 우리에게서 멀리 옮기셨으며

sentences.original_text: as far as the east is from the west
so far has he removed our transgressions from us
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 우리의 죄를 우리에게서 그렇게 멀리 옮기셨다
